Package com.atakmap.coremap.conversions

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AngleUtilities
    Provides common utilities for formatting and converting Angles within ATAK.
    AreaUtilities
    Allows for quick formatting of area information.
    ConversionFactors
    Centralized location for conversion factors.
    CoordinateFormatUtilities
    Provides a common set of conversions from valid Coordinates in ATAK to the appropriate coordinate format requested.
    SpanUtilities
    Format spans given a value and a Span type.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Angle
    Provides an enumeration for the value of the angle.
    Area
    Commonly used terms for the measurement of Area.
    CoordinateFormat
    Acceptable designations for displaying Coordinates within ATAK.
    Span
    Designate valid span types within ATAK.
